sqlMap.insert:
insert into Child ( firstName, lastName, classes, gender, birthDate, photoURL ) values ( #firstName#, #lastName#, #classes#, #gender#, #birthDate#, #photoURL# )
SELECT last_insert_id() AS ID FROM Child limit 1
sqlMap.select: select * from Child where id = #id# limit 1
select c.* from Child as c, Relations_Child_User as rcu where c.childID = rcu.childID and rcu.userID = #userId#
sqlMap.update: update Child set firstName = #firstName#, lastName = #lastName#, birthDate = #birthDate#, classes = #classes# where id = #id#
update Child set photoURL = #photoURL# where id = #id#
update Child set cover = #cover# where id = #id#
